relics.name: Bottled Anger
relics.description: At the start of each combat, put all Angers from your deck into your hand. Can overfill your hand. Future card rewards have 1 more card to choose from. The last card in future card rewards will always be an Anger.

relics.name: Compendium
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random Rare card to your draw pile. It costs 1 less.
relics.flavorText: How to win the game in 3 easy steps.

relics.name: Cultist Figurine
relics.description: Gain 1 Strength every 3 turns.

relics.name: Focusing Lens
relics.description: Whenever you attack an enemy, all Lightning orbs will target that enemy for the rest of the turn.

relics.name: Ice Cube
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 Dexterity. At the end of the first 3 turns of combat, lose 1 Dexterity.

relics.name: Mousetrap
relics.description: The first time you get attacked each combat, deal 15 damage to the attacker.

relics.name: Pendant
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose an adjective. Adjectives give bonuses at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: It attunes to the user's will.

relics.name: Pet Rock
relics.description: At the start of each turn, deal 5 damage to the enemy with the least HP.
relics.flavorText: Remember to feed your pet rock once every 6 hours.

relics.name: Sapping Stone
relics.description: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose 3 Strength until the end of their turn.
relics.flavorText: Saps away the strength of others.

relics.name: Weightless Weaponry
relics.description: Your Shivs now Retain.
relics.flavorText: Have you ever seen an anti-gravity knife?

relics.name: Writer's Block
relics.description: At the end of your turn, if you have not played a skill this turn, gain 6 Block.

relics.name: Bottled Shadow
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. When you play that card, it is played an additional time.
relics.flavorText: How do you bottle a lack of photons in the visible light spectrum?

relics.name: Bottled Tsunami
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. When you play that card, add 2 copies with Ethereal and Exhaust to your hand.

relics.name: Byrd Charm
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Flight.

relics.name: Byrd-B-Gone
relics.description: Whenever you are attacked and don't lose health, gain 1 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: These Byrd spikes seem a little situational

relics.name: Disaster in a Bottle
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. When you play that card, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Guardian Spirit
relics.description: Upon pickup, fill your potion slots with Fairy in a Bottle.

relics.name: Icicle Precepts
relics.description: Whenever you Channel a Frost orb, gain 1 Thorns. Whenever you Evoke or remove a Frost orb, lose 1 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: Rule #142: Icicles can be used as a stabbing weapon for self defence.

relics.name: Rapid Fire
relics.description: Whenever you deal damage to an enemy, increase it by 2.

relics.name: Stainless Steel
relics.description: Every time you gain Block 3 times in a single turn, gain 5 Block.

relics.name: Wondrous Wand
relics.description: Draw an extra card at the start of combat. It costs 0 this turn.

relics.name: Ancestral Armaments
relics.description: Shivs are now upgraded when created. Shivs can be upgraded any number of times.
relics.flavorText: The armaments are actually made of knives.

relics.name: Berserker's Draught
relics.description: Whenever you play an attack, add a charge to this relic. Whenever you play a skill, remove all charges. At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength for each charge on this relic.

relics.name: Chaining Vapors
relics.description: If you've already drawn 4 cards this turn (Excluding your initial hand), whenever you draw a card, apply 1 Poison to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: How a chain of poison gas is made is a mystery.

relics.name: Fiery Hot Pepper
relics.description: At the start of combat, shuffle 2 Burns into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Burn, deal 8 damage to ALL enemies and discard it.
relics.flavorText: Consumption not recommended unless you're a fan of spontaneous combustion.

relics.name: Hand of Midas
relics.description: Whenever you attack a non-elite non-boss enemy, there is a 5% chance that you gain Gold equal to their HP and instantly kill them.

relics.name: Miracle Grow
relics.description: The passive of your Dark Orbs trigger a number of times equal to what slot they're in.

relics.name: Snecko Scepter
relics.description: Whenever you draw a card that costs 3 or more, its cost is randomized.

relics.name: Tough Gloves
relics.description: Take no thorns type damage from enemies.
relics.flavorText: Guaranteed to protect you from thorns, or your money back.

relics.name: Wind-Up Auto-Dealer
relics.description: Right Click to gain a charge. At the start of each turn, if this relic has charges, lose a charge and draw a card.

relics.name: Zombie Heart
relics.description: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, gain 1 Max HP, take 1 damage.

relics.name: Coffee
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Every 3 turns, add a Void to the top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: A quick caffeine boost that leaves you feeling a little de-energized later

relics.name: Demon Heart
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you have 3 or more attacks in hand, gain [E].
relics.flavorText: Side effects include uncontrollable urges for world domination.

relics.name: Neutrino Generator
relics.description: Whenever you spend 2 or more energy on a card, Channel a random Orb.
relics.flavorText: Has a known side effect of being hard to pronounce.

relics.name: Rigged Dice
relics.description: Whenever you discard a card, your next Attack this turn deals double damage.

relics.name: Stolen Kidneys
relics.description: Upon pickup, remove all Basic Strikes from your deck. At the start of each turn, draw a card until you draw a non-Basic card.

relics.name: Trackpad
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Every 3 to 5 seconds, this relic hijacks your cursor and moves it to a random nearby spot.

relics.name: Bi-phase Biplane
relics.description: At the start of your turn, put a random non-Status non-Curse card from your Exhaust pile to your hand. it gains Purge and trackpad:Spectral.

relics.name: Pocket Galaxy
relics.description: Any time a card enters your discard pile, shuffle a random card into your draw pile. It costs 1 less.
relics.flavorText: A galaxy in the palm of your hand.

relics.name: Void Sphere
relics.description: At the start of combat, give all cards in your draw pile Ethereal.
